mapper.insert: insert into exam (t_no, s_no, e_no, e_name, e_content, e_content2, e_content3, e_content4, e_answer) values (#{tNo.tNo},#{sNo.sNo},#{eNo},#{eName},#{eContent},#{eContent2},#{eContent3},#{eContent4},#{eAnswer})
mapper.select: select * from exam e join test t on e.t_no = t.t_no join subject s on e.s_no=s.s_no and e.t_no = s.t_no where e.t_no=#{tNo.tNo} and e.s_no=#{sNo.sNo}
select * from exam e join test t on e.t_no = t.t_no join subject s on e.s_no=s.s_no and e.t_no = s.t_no where e.e_no=#{eNo} and e.t_no=#{tNo.tNo} and e.s_no=#{sNo.sNo}
mapper.delete: delete from exam where t_no=#{tNo.tNo} and s_no=#{sNo.sNo} and e_no=#{eNo}
mapper.select: select * from exam e left join test t on e.t_no = t.t_no where t.t_no=#{tNo.tNo} order by e_no limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
